patthana3.6:7.1: Noganthaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:8.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.6:10.1: Ganthaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:10.2: Ganthaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:10.3: Ganthaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho akusalo ca nogantho akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana3.6:11.1: Noganthaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.6:12.1: Ganthaṃ akusalañca noganthaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.6:13.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.6:14.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana3.6:16.1: Gantho akusalo dhammo ganthassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.6:17.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.6:21.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.6:22.1: Noganthaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:27.1: Ganthaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.6:28.1: Aganthaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aganthaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:29.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana3.6:31.1: Ganthaniyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:32.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.6:34.1: Ganthaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.6:35.1: Aganthaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. #3
patthana3.6:36.1: Ganthaniyaṃ abyākatañca aganthaniyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:37.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.6:41.1: Ganthavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:42.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.6:44.1: Ganthasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.6:45.1: Ganthavippayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
patthana3.6:46.1: Ganthasampayuttaṃ akusalañca ganthavippayuttaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:47.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … avigate cha.
patthana3.6:48.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā cha, napurejāte cha … pe … nakamme cattāri, navippayutte cha.
patthana3.6:50.1: Ganthasampayutto akusalo dhammo ganthasampayuttassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.6:51.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte cha … pe … nissaye cha, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme cattāri … pe … magge cattāri, sampayutte cha … pe … avigate cha.
patthana3.6:52.1: Ganthavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:53.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.6:57.1: Ganthaniyañceva no ca ganthaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:58.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.6:60.1: Ganthañceva ganthaniyañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho ceva ganthaniyo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.6:61.1: Ganthaniyañceva no ca ganthaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.6:62.1: Ganthañceva ganthaniyaṃ akusalañca ganthaniyañceva no ca ganthaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho ceva ganthaniyo ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.6:63.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.6:64.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā nava … pe … nakamme tīṇi … pe … navippayutte nava.
patthana3.6:66.1: Gantho ceva ganthaniyo ca akusalo dhammo ganthassa ceva ganthaniyassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.6:67.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava … pe … kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.6:71.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.6:72.1: Ganthaniyañceva no ca ganthaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthaniyo ceva no ca gantho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:73.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.6:77.1: Ganthañceva ganthasampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:78.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.6:79.1: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, nakamme tīṇi … pe … navippayutte nava.
patthana3.6:81.1: Gantho ceva ganthasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo ganthassa ceva ganthasampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.6:82.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … kamme āhāre indriye jhāne tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.6:86.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
patthana3.6:89.1: Ganthavippayuttaṃ ganthaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto ganthaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.6:90.1: Ganthavippayuttaṃ aganthaniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto aganthaniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:91.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana3.6:93.1: Ganthavippayuttaṃ ganthaniyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto ganthaniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:96.1: Ganthavippayuttaṃ ganthaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto ganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.6:97.1: Ganthavippayuttaṃ aganthaniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto aganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.6:98.1: Ganthavippayuttaṃ ganthaniyaṃ abyākatañca ganthavippayuttaṃ aganthaniyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca ganthavippayutto ganthaniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.6:99.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke pañca … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.6:101.1: Ganthavippayutto ganthaniyo abyākato dhammo ganthavippayuttassa ganthaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana3.6:102.1: Ganthavippayutto aganthaniyo abyākato dhammo ganthavippayuttassa aganthaniyassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.6:103.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ, kamme … pe … magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate satta.
patthana3.6:107.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
